metadata.name: GatherNetworkInfo.VBS Reconnaissance Script Output
metadata.comment: Detects creation of files which are the results of executing the built-in reconnaissance script "C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\config')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\hotfixinfo.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\netiostate.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\sysportslog.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\vmswitchlog.evtx'))))

output.summary: Detects creation of files which are the results of executing the built-in reconnaissance script "C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs".
